body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Johnston. Father of Mary Johnston, William Johnston, George Johnston, Sarah E. Johnston, James A. Johnston, Lavina Johnston, Andrew Johnston, Miranda J. Johnston, and David Johnston. Farmer in Grayson County in 1850. Farmer in Grayson County in 1860. Farmer in Grayson County in 1863. Served in the Grayson County Home Guard as a captain in 1863 and 1864. Ordered arrested in October 1864 by Governor Thomas E. Bramlette and General Stephen G. Burbridge for unlawful acts committed against loyal citizens in Grayson County.
